text.page:
189
102-95a @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba hu

190
102-95b pu tra pra ti sa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag deng 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thab rtsod mtshang brus te bkye bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di zung shig chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig tad+ya thA/ da De/ ba da De/ u pa da Da da De/ u pa da De da Da/ gam b+hI ri/ a brta ne/ ni brta ne/ d+ha hi d+ha hi/ a brta ni/ bdag gi/ sarbe shA na karmi kA nAM/ pra t+yanri kA nAM/ pra t+ya mo tri NAM/ tsak+Shu mo hA nAM ka ro mi/ shro tre mo hA nAM ka ro mi/ dzi hwA grA tAM ka ro mi/ dza mab+hA nAM/ stam b+ha nAM/ mo hA nAM/ pra mo hA NAM/ khyim bdag gang la la zhig bu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar po la lan bdun sngags te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na de'i lus la dug dang mtshon dang nad dang rims nad dang rims drag pos mi tshugs so/ /'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi

191
102-96a lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
